Html:
Loading up my druid I am still getting haste values far higher than they should be.

The 20 haste gem is valued at 25.2 while the 23 spellpower gem is only valued at 21.35

From the patch notes, I thought this had been fixed, but it still appears to be an issue.
Is this different from how it was in 2.1.3?

Mine is valuing the 23 SP at 24.71 and the haste at 21.32, but it's still very obvious that haste is being overvalued simply by looking at the way it's valuing all my other items.

Does anyone have a suggestion for how to compensate for this? I'm new to resto itemization and floundering big time. :(
It seems to me to be exactly as it was back in the last version.  So far I have yet to see anything but haste gems at the top of the gem lists.
